subject: AI & Agents
title: What AI Actually Can and Cannot Do Today
description: A quick, practical guide to What AI Actually Can and Cannot Do Today.

hook.text: Somewhere between 'AI is just a toy' and 'AI is omniscient' lies the truth. Let's find it.

buildup.text: AI excels at: pattern recognition, text generation, translation, code writing, image synthesis.

discovery.text: AI struggles with: causal reasoning, physical world understanding, reliable factual accuracy, genuine empathy.

twist.text: The same model that writes beautiful poetry can't reliably count the letters in 'strawberry.'

climax.text: Understanding what AI can and can't do is the most important literacy skill of this decade.

punchline.text: Neither magic nor useless. Powerful and limited. That's the honest truth.

quiz.question: What is a task that current AI consistently struggles with?
options: Reliable causal reasoning and physical world understanding
